price: Dájúdájú A ṣẹ̀dá ènìyàn pẹ̀lú ìrísí tó dára jùlọ.
arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: laqad khalaqnā al-insāna fī aḥsani taqwīmin
